name: Lost in the Woods (Pantsuman)
description:
This is my first finished game ever.
I started creating games 15 days ago and this game is for the ludum dare jam in which you had to create a game within 3 days.

I didn't make the art and sound myself. I used standard assets and free assets from the Unity Assets store.

All scripts beside the one for the menu (which i modified) i wrote myself.

Enjoy.
